/about.title: About
/about.body: Course Description In this short course, students will learn about one of the most impactful innovations by humankindâ€” Internetâ€”which has transformed how we do business, connect with others, and learn. Students will learn how the Internet is structured, and how data is transmitted across the network. They will also learn about Internet security, privacy, and ethical issues related to Internet use.
